com.simulus.io

Class FileIO

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.simulus.io.FileIO

  • public class FileIO
extends java.lang.Object
    Used by MainApp to copy/delete the temporary CSV file created in CsvExport to a new location.

      • copyFile

        public void copyFile(java.io.File source,
                     java.io.File dest)
              throws java.io.IOException
        Copies a file to a destination location from the source.
        Parameters:
        source - The full path of the source file
        dest - The full destination path including filename
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an error occurs while copying the CSV file.
